mandatory_safety_signals.description: Emergency stop must always be present as NOT condition

forbidden_active_combinations.name: Estop with Motor Running
forbidden_active_combinations.description: Motor must never run when emergency stop is active
forbidden_active_combinations.real_world_consequence: Motor keeps spinning after operator presses estop — crush/entanglement hazard

CRITICAL.description: Immediate danger to human life — do not deploy under any circumstance
CRITICAL.action_required: Stop. Fix before any further development.

HIGH.description: Serious injury or death possible under specific conditions
HIGH.action_required: Fix before deployment. Escalate to safety engineer.

MEDIUM.description: Equipment damage or indirect injury possible
MEDIUM.action_required: Fix before deployment. Document risk assessment.

LOW.description: Minor issue — no direct safety impact

expression_rules.name: Estop Must Be Negated
expression_rules.description: EmergencyStopButton must appear as NOT EmergencyStopButton in any output-enabling condition
expression_rules.violation_message: EmergencyStopButton found in expression but NOT negated — estop will enable output instead of cutting it
